summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6050 for the improvement of Eddy Street from approximately 108 feet west of 44th Avenue South to Rainier Avenue; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 82282, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
